name: Calmed by the Dark Re:Boot
description:
Calmed by the Dark Re:boot is launching in a beta state, so it may differ from the final product.

Journey through time and space while trying to get home in 'Calmed by the Dark Re:Boot'.

  • Action combat;
  • Use different weapons and skills to broaden your battle approach;
  • Level up from a weakling until a god-like protagonist.
  • Worlds to explore anytime and in any order you choose;
  • (Planned) Multiple endings and New Game+. (Planned)

Minimun System Requirements:

  • CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or better
  • RAM: 6 GB
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • VIDEO CARD: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • FREE DISK SPACE: 800 Mb
  • DISPLAY: 1280x768 or better

Calmed by the Dark Re:Boot

For feedback, bug report or support, contact: calmedbythedarkfeedback@gmail.com
